summary: Test suites that validate the behavior of the RichProgressBar and TQDMProgressBar callbacks in PyTorch Lightning, checking configuration options, visual rendering, metric formatting, theme customization, refresh handling, error scenarios, pickling compatibility, and interaction with the Trainer across various training modes including fast development runs and multi‑GPU setups.
business_intent: Ensure that progress‑bar callbacks function correctly and reliably, providing accurate and customizable training progress feedback for users of PyTorch Lightning.
